title: Pixel Font to compliment FF DIN
content:
Howdy-  
I’m looking for a pixel font to be used throughout a flash website for a client; their corporate font is DIN, and (I’m a graphic designer, not a web developer - so completely clueless with all things flash) I’ve been told that it’s not ideal to use DIN outlined in a flash site (and there are several text popups which the client will be managing/updating periodically themselves.)

Ideally I’d like something which has a similar feel to DIN - but certainly would welcome any advice...

Many Thanks...

 [‹ Icky Alert: "R" in Radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185654/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36459 "Go to previous forum topic") [A favorite font designer featured... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185654/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36353 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pbags

comments.content: anything square will be just fine
